mapper.insert: insert into attendances( e_id, a_year, a_month, a_day, a_check_in_time, a_check_out_time, minute ) values( #{eId}, #{aYear}, #{aMonth}, #{aDay}, #{aCheckInTime}, #{aCheckOutTime}, #{minute} )
mapper.update: update attendances set e_id=#{eId}, a_year=#{aYear}, a_month=#{aMonth}, a_day=#{aDay}, a_check_in_time=#{aCheckInTime}, a_check_out_time=#{aCheckOutTime}, minute=#{minute} where a_id = #{aId}
